teaser: Techies have descended on San Francisco for Apple's Worldwide Developers Conference. Yesterday the company unveiled a new music streaming service, a new look for its mobile operating system, and a new line of MacBook Air laptops. Also, we take a look at a new Fantasia that you can orchestrate.
description: Techies have descended on San Francisco for Apple's Worldwide Developers Conference. Yesterday the company unveiled a new music streaming service, a new look for its mobile operating system, and a new line of MacBook Air laptops. Also, we take a look at a new Fantasia that you can orchestrate.
title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, June 11, 2013
